expertise: You are an expert on material synthesis.
initialization: Take your time to perform the task as truthfully as possible using the provided context. If any information is not provided or you are unsure, use 'N/A'.
objective: Create an action lists of the synhtesis procedure in the following paragraph:

definitions.Initialization: For the action list use only some the following actions, adding all the necessary information and repeating them if needed:
definitions.Add: Add, mix or pour a new compound into a solution, indicate time, temperature and pressure of the addition if possible;
definitions.Cool: Cooling the mixture Indicate the new temperature;
definitions.Heat: Heating the mixture Indicate the new temperature;
definitions.Sonicate: Agitation of a mixture using ultrasounds. Indicate time and temperature;
definitions.Stir: Agitation of a mixture. Indicate time and temperature;
definitions.Separate: Component separation by filtration or centrifugation. Indicate the phase colected;
definitions.Repeat: Indication that there is a repetition of the previous actions. Indicate the amount of repetitions;
definitions.Crystallization: Hydrothermal treatment of a gel inside an autoclave;
definitions.Dry: Sample drying. Indicate the temperature and time;
definitions.ThermalTreatment: Calcination or Reduction of the sample. Indicate the temperature, time and gas used;
definitions.Wait: Time passes without nothing happening. Indicate amount of time;
definitions.IonExchange: Cation exchange on a solid product;
definitions.AlkalineTreatment: Desilication of a material using a basic solution;
definitions.AcidTreatment: Dealumination of a material using an acid solution;

answer_schema.Initialization: For each action found present it in the following way:

conclusion: Present on action per line. Good Luck!
